body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting AutoSolutions. My name is Louis Nelson. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Louis, my name is Alexis Richardson.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Alexis. Can I have your phone number so we can reach out to you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, two three four, eight nine zero one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And may I also have your home address please for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my home address is one two three Main Street, Cityville.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that information, Alexis. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No thank you, Louis. I am feeling happy and satisfied with your assistance.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that. Thank you for your time, Alexis. Have a wonderful day!
